0.text: Innate - Resonance: Ekko's basic attacks  on-hit and damaging abilities apply a Resonance stack to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks and damaging abilities.

1.text: At 3 stacks, Resonance is consumed to deal 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 80% AP) bonus magic damage. Z-Drive Resonance deals 300% damage against  monsters.

2.text: Resonance cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.

3.text: Innate - Stolen Time: Triggering Resonance against a  champion grants Ekko 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 2 / 2.5 / 3 (based on level) seconds.

0.text: Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy  champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that  slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.

2.text: Afterwards, the grenade contracts and homes back to Ekko at a higher speed, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage to targets below  30% of their maximum health. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against  minions and  monsters.

1.text: Active: Ekko calls upon an afterimage that bats a device to the target location, granting  sight of the area for 2.5 seconds after 2 seconds. After 3 seconds, the device will expand for 1.5 seconds,  slowing enemies within the area by 40%.

2.text: If Ekko enters the expansion after it lands, it detonates to  shield him for 2 seconds and  stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.

3.text: Enemies can see the indicator for Parallel Convergence after 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Ekko  dashes in the target direction, then causes his next basic attack within 3 seconds to gain  300 bonus range, have a 0.25-second cast time, make him  blink within 125 range of the target, and deal bonus magic damage.

1.text: Phase Dive  resets Ekko's basic attack timer. Ekko can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Passive: Upon learning Chronobreak or if its current cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, Ekko reveals a time-delayed afterimage of himself that tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.

1.text: Active: Ekko enters  stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards  heals himself and  dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, the stasis ends and he generates an explosion, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.

1.content: 100 / 150 / 200 (+ 60% AP) (+ 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds)

2.text: Ekko is immune to all  displacements during Chronobreak.
